CatDescriptText: image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 27, 1976, pg. 21 reads: "Robert Haygood - The man who was supposed to lead the Pitt Panthers to national glory has become the forgotten man after suffering a leg injury which sidelined him for the season. Quarterback Robert Haygood is still on crutches after suffering an injury in second game of the season. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: University of Pittsburgh football player no. 10 Robert Haygood holding football at forty yard line at Pitt Stadium
